title: Pickles 4 Breakfast
description: Hampton deView’s most popular program ever. A fever dream series about a baby, pickles, birds, and sickles.
quote: If the bird steals the pickle, I’ll kill it with a sickle.
altHero: an animated baby with bold eyebrows cronching on a pickle
alt1: a mom talks to her baby
alt2: a bird flies in a kitchen, on the wall is a sign that says “Live Laff Shove”
alt3: the bird flies above the baby who is holding a sickle
alt4: the baby standing with his sickle as the kitchen floods with pickle juice
